title: RESTMO Hose Pipe Spray Gun, Heavy Duty Garden Hose Spray Gun, High Pressure Hose Nozzle, Metal Hand Sprayer with 7 Patterns and Water Flow Control, Ideal to Water Plant & Lawn, Wash Car & Pet (Yellow)
features: HEAVY-DUTY HOSE PIPE SPRAY GUN: Body and trigger are constructed with 100% powder-coated metal material, which is robust to resist rust, corrosion and wear. The shock resistant rubberized bezel dial can also prevent it from accidental drops and damage. It is much stronger, more durable and long-lasting than plastic water nozzles.

7 WATERING PATTERNS: Rotate the sprayer head dial to select a water pattern from Shower, Jet, Flat, Center, Cone, Full and Mist. Whether you need the high-pressure jet to clean your patio or the soft shower to water your garden, the 7 patterns have you covered.

WATER FLOW CONTROL: Flow control knob can adjust the watering pressure for each of the 7 spray patterns, which can expand your options when you need to water your garden, lawn, grass, plants, and flower beds. It is also flexible when you clean the patio, wash the car, dog and pet.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Coated with the soft TPU and non-slip grip, this low-profile hose nozzle adds comfort and avoids hand fatigue. The pistol grip front trigger is easy to hold and can be locked anytime.
QUICK CONNECTION MALE INCLUDED: Packed with the quick connection male connector, perfect to attach on your garden hose, make the nozzle leak-free and save unnecessary water.
description: Product Description Patterns Introduction Shower : Simulating rainwater droplets. It is well known that plants prefer natural rainwater, but rainwater cannot always be present. Showers in hose pipe spray guns can compensate for this. Mist & Cone: Mist is mild atomization, while Cone is mass atomization. Flowers and seedlings require soft water mist to replenish moisture, which can prevent damage to plants and the soil near roots. Jet & Full & Center & Flat： Four types of strong water splashes in different shapes meet various washing needs, such as car washing, soil washing, crevice washing, etc. Selection of different lengths Garden Hose Water Spray Lance Water Spray Lance Length Hose Pipe Spray Gun Length Water Spray Lance (Fixed length 48cm) Length Water Spray Lance (Scalable length 95~155cm) Spray nozzle adjustment angle / Spray nozzle adjustment angle 0~180° Spray nozzle adjustment angle 0~180° Usage scenario Flower pots/ Lawns/ On the ground Usage scenario Flower rack/ Bottom of car/ Inner side of tire Usage scenario Plants hanging from high places Built for Durability and Comfort RESTMO Heavy-duty Garden Hose Pipe Spray Gun Providing an ideal combination of comfort and durability, this garden hose spray gun is built with premium zinc-alloy metal material. The hand grip is coated with soft TPU, not only to insulate the hand from the temperature of the water, but also to provide a comfortable grip. Choose from the seven different spray patterns to handle a wide variety of watering needs. Control the water flow to water different kinds of plants. The video showcases the product in use.
